title: Understanding Excel Functions
text: Excel has a variety of functions that perform different operations. Some functions are used for mathematical calculations, while others are used for data analysis.

title: Common Excel Functions
text: Functions like 'Sum', 'Average', and 'Count' are commonly used in Excel for basic arithmetic and statistical operations.

title: Identifying Uncommon Functions
text: Some functions are less commonly used or might not exist in Excel. It's important to recognize which functions are standard and which are not.

title: Recognizing Non-Standard Functions
text: The function 'Sumif' is not a standard function in Excel. It is a combination of 'Sum' and a conditional statement, which is not a single function.
